snippet: Blame the baby boomers for the dangerous combination of burdensome debt and thin paychecks.
abstract: Steven Rattner Op-Ed article warns economic prospects of millennial generation are dismal due to sluggish economy with high unemployment, flat wage growth and extremely large student debt load; raises concern about future of Social Security and Medicare and calls for shifting priority of federal government to boost education, infrastructure and to reform entitlement programs.
lead_paragraph: Blame the baby boomers for the dangerous combination of burdensome debt and thin paychecks.

headline.print_headline: Making Life Too Hard for Millennials
headline.main: We’re Making Life Too Hard for Millennials
